posts.title: Move Over, FAANG: 1 Unstoppable "Magnificent 7" Stock to Buy Hand Over Fist
posts.body: The stock market has a new leadership group, but it features several familiar names.

posts.title: Jim Cramer talks diversification and portfolio strategy, compares ARK's Cathie Wood and BlackRock's Larry Fink
posts.body: CNBC's Jim Cramer on Monday stressed his belief that diversification is key to a successful portfolio. Cramer looked at the strategies of ARK 's Cathie Wood and BlackRock 's Larry Fink to explain why he thinks diversification is usually the best strategy for …

posts.title: China is telling anyone who'll listen it's open for business again – but its economy has a Xi Jinping problem
posts.body: Elon Musk and Janet Yellen have both visited Beijing recently, with China desperate to signal to that it's still a good place to invest.

posts.title: Elon Musk's brother and other Tesla directors settled claims they paid themselves too much
posts.body: Tesla directors will return $735 million to the company to settle a lawsuit alleging they paid themselves too much. As part of the settlement, the 12 directors also agreed to forfeit all compensation from 2021 to 2023, and change the way they are being compen…
